page.title: 17Recreation
page.content: There are unfortunately no sports centres in the immediate area.However there is one in the nearby village of Huncote.There are tennis courts in the area as well as football and cricket facilities.Most sports ,however, are better served in the towns and villages nearby.There is considerable interesT in gardening in the area and the local vegetable and flower shows are well attended with judges of the Leicester Show attending .The arts and crafts in the area are , when possible,undertaken in the community centres as evening classes.Similarly any indoor sports are catered for in these centres.Games such as badminton are catered in this way.Swimming a popular activity, is served in the town of Hinckley or at Enderby sports centre.
